title: DashingAgent
author: DashingAgent
content: Mineable dollar pegged stablecoins can be generated and it ain't out of thin airMiners consume energy and this energy has a price value, if stablecoins use this mechanism then the generation of an equivalent amount of USDs are possible, further more we have resources like clean energy which we are wasting, we should use those resources (solar/wind etc) energy to generate stablecoins, this will bring more money to the blockchain ecosystem, furthermore we can overcome the cryptocurrencies aka forked projects being created nowadays. This will also make our economy better as governments can use this resource to create more jobs, do more development and a little poverty can be overcome
